languages.text: "Это крупнейший порт и столица торговли всего Простора Коронус. Здесь размещена верфь, где можно провести полный осмотр и починку пустотного корабля, а также хор астропатов — узловая точка в коммуникациях Простора Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "Это крупнейший порт и столица торговли всего Простора Коронус. Здесь размещена верфь, где можно провести полный осмотр и починку пустотного корабля, а также хор астропатов — узловая точка в коммуникациях Простора Коронус".

languages.text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."
languages.original_text: "Это крупнейший порт и столица торговли всего Простора Коронус. Здесь размещена верфь, где можно провести полный осмотр и починку пустотного корабля, а также хор астропатов — узловая точка в коммуникациях Простора Коронус".

traits.locale_text: "It is the largest port and the trade capital of the entire Koronus Expanse. It has a dock that will allow us to examine and repair the void vessel as well as an astropathic choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

"It is the largest port and the trade capital of the entire Koronus Expanse. It has a dock that will allow us to examine and repair the void vessel as well as an astropathic choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

"It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own astropathic choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

"It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own astropathic choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

"It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

languages.text: «Es el mayor puerto y la capital comercial de la Extensión de Koronus. Tiene un muelle en el que podremos inspeccionar y reparar la nave del vacío y su propio Coro de Astrópatas: el nexo de comunicaciones de la Extensión de Koronus».
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: «Es el mayor puerto y la capital comercial de la Extensión de Koronus. Tiene un muelle en el que podremos inspeccionar y reparar la nave del vacío y su propio Coro de Astrópatas: el nexo de comunicaciones de la Extensión de Koronus».

languages.text: “它是科罗努斯扩区规模最大的港口，也是这片星域的贸易中心。这里有个船坞，可以对我们的虚空舰进行维修。此外，落脚港还有自己的星语唱诗班，也就是科罗努斯扩区的通讯枢纽。”
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: “它是科罗努斯星域规模最大的港口，也是这片星域的贸易中心。这里有个船坞，可以对我们的虚空舰进行维修。此外，落脚港还有自己的星语唱诗班，也就是科罗努斯星域的通讯枢纽。”

languages.text: 「こちらはコロヌス・エクスパンス最大の港であり、貿易の中心地です。ヴォイドシップの検査や修理ができる造船所と、独自の感応通信聖歌隊―コロヌス・エクスパンスの通信の中核であることが自慢なのですよ」
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: 「こちらはコロヌス・エクスパンス最大の港であり、貿易の中心地です。ヴォイドシップの検査や修理ができる造船所と、独自の感応通信聖歌隊―コロヌス・エクスパンスの通信の中核であることが自慢なのですよ」

languages.text: "Es ist der größte Hafen und das Handelszentrum der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In seinem Dock können wir das Raumschiff inspizieren und reparieren, und es verfügt über einen eigenen astropathischen Chor – der Kommunikationsnexus der Koronus-Ausdehnung."
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist der größte Hafen und das Handelszentrum der Koronus-Ausdehnung. In seinem Dock können wir das Raumschiff inspizieren und reparieren, und es verfügt über einen eigenen astropathischen Chor – der Kommunikationsnexus der Koronus-Ausdehnung."

languages.text: « Il s'agit de la capitale commerciale des Étendues de Koronus, ainsi que de son plus grand astroport. En plus de son chantier naval qui nous permettra d'inspecter et de réparer le vaisseau, Castel possède son propre chœur astropathique, le relais de communication du secteur. »
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: « Il s'agit de la capitale commerciale des Étendues de Koronus, ainsi que de son plus grand astroport. En plus de son chantier naval qui nous permettra d'inspecter et de réparer le vaisseau, Castel possède son propre chœur astropathique, le relais de communication du secteur. »

languages.text: "Koronus Enginliği'ndeki en büyük liman ve ticaret başkentidir. Uçsuz gemisini inceleyip onarabileceğimiz bir tersane ile kendi Astropatik Koro'suna, yani Koronus Enginliği iletişim bağlantı noktasına sahiptir."
languages.original_text: "It is the largest port and the trading capital of the Koronus Expanse. It has a dockyard that will allow us to inspect and repair the voidship, and it boasts its own Astropathic Choir — the Koronus Expanse communications nexus."

traits.locale_text: "Koronus Enginliği'ndeki en büyük liman ve ticaret başkentidir. Uçsuz gemisini inceleyebileceğimiz ve onarabileceğimiz bir rıhtıma ve de kendi Astropatik Koro'suna sahiptir: Koronus Enginliği iletişim bağlantı noktası."
